decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly play Eldrazi creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck utilizes powerful Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Eldrazi Obligator to apply pressure and finish the game quickly. With the help of cards like Gemstone Caverns and Serum Powder, the deck aims to have explosive starts and overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan. The deck is designed to be aggressive and proactive, aiming to win the game as quickly as possible.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively use Death's Shadow as a key threat while disrupting the opponent's game plan with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Assassin's Trophy while also utilizing creatures like Tarmogoyf and Ranger-Captain of Eos to apply pressure. Liliana of the Veil provides additional disruption and removal, while Serra the Benevolent offers a flying threat and protection. The deck is designed to be efficient and relentless in its pursuit of victory.

The deck focuses on quickly cycling through creatures to fill the graveyard while disrupting the opponent's game plan. Once a critical mass of creatures is in the graveyard, the player can cast Living End to return all the creatures to the battlefield, potentially overwhelming the opponent with a powerful army. The deck includes cards that can cycle through the library quickly, cascade spells that can cast Living End for free, and removal spells to deal with threats on the opponent's side of the battlefield.

This aggressive Hollow One deck aims to quickly fill up the graveyard with cards like Faithless Looting and Burning Inquiry to power out big threats like Gurmag Angler and Flamewake Phoenix. Using graveyard recursion with cards like Unearth and Bloodghast, the deck looks to apply pressure early and often with hasty creatures and burn spells like Lightning Bolt. The key strategy is to consistently dump cards into the graveyard and take advantage of their powerful effects to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on disrupting opponents' strategies with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck also utilizes cards like Leonin Arbiter and Ghost Quarter to disrupt opponents' mana bases. The main goal is to slow down opponents while quickly building a board presence and finishing off the game with powerful creatures. The deck thrives on disrupting opponents' plans and quickly closing out games before they can recover.

This deck focuses on utilizing Niv-Mizzet Reborn as the central card advantage engine, casting multicolored spells to trigger his ability and draw cards. The deck includes a variety of removal spells and disruptive cards to control the game until Niv-Mizzet can come down and take over. Glittering Wish allows the deck to search for key sideboard cards, while Bring to Light can search for versatile answers from the deck. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's multicolor requirements and ensure consistent access to all necessary colors.

This Bant Aggro deck focuses on disrupting opponents with counterspells and removal while deploying efficient threats to quickly apply pressure. The deck leverages powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Time Raveler to control the game and protect its creatures. With a mix of versatile creatures like Tarmogoyf and Knight of the Reliquary, along with disruptive threats like Spell Queller and Ice-Fang Coatl, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a mix of aggression and disruption, utilizing a variety of lands to fix mana and provide utility.

This Modern Aggro deck relies on using Hardened Scales to amplify the +1/+1 counters placed on creatures. By combining cards such as Hangarback Walker, Walking Ballista, and Arcbound Ravager with Hardened Scales, players can quickly build a powerful board presence and overwhelm opponents with a combination of modular creatures and direct damage. The deck also includes ways to protect its creatures, such as Welding Jar and Throne of Geth, while utilizing Mox Opal for ramp. The combination of synergy and aggression makes this deck a formidable force in 1 vs 1 matchups.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively deploy efficient creatures like Tarmogoyf, Wild Nacatl, and Lightning Skelemental, supported by burn spells like Lightning Helix and Lightning Bolt. The mana base is designed to maximize the potential of Tribal Flames, while also providing enough flexibility to cast the needed creatures and spells. The deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain a fast tempo, overwhelming opponents with a combination of creature-based aggression and burn damage. It prioritizes speed and efficiency to close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and versatile planeswalkers. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Force of Negation and Cryptic Command, while also dealing with threats using cards like Assassin's Trophy and Fatal Push. The deck also has card advantage engines like Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, along with efficient creatures like Ice-Fang Coatl. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the deck's diverse card requirements.

Control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy using counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. Use planeswalkers and creatures to generate advantage and control the game. Utilize cards like Terminus to wipe the opponent's board and gain tempo. Keep the opponent's hand empty with Narset, Parter of Veils, and slowly grind out the win condition using planeswalkers and resilient threats like Celestial Colonnade. Prioritize resource management and smart decision making to outplay your opponent and control the pace of the game.

This deck aims to create an infinite combo loop by using Saheeli Rai and Felidar Guardian to repeatedly copy the Guardian and generate an unlimited number of tokens. The deck includes cards that help with card draw, control the opponent's board state, and provide necessary mana fixing. By efficiently controlling the game and assembling the combo pieces, the deck can quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this Dredge combo deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with key creatures like Bloodghast and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis using cards like Stitcher's Supplier and Satyr Wayfinder. This allows for explosive plays while also utilizing disruptive cards such as Thoughtseize and Smallpox to control the game. By utilizing the graveyard as a resource and using cards like Cabal Therapist to disrupt opponent's strategies, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and disruption while also having strong interactive elements like Fatal Push and Inquisition of Kozilek.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently deal poison counters to the opponent through infect creatures like Glistener Elf and Blighted Agent. The deck utilizes pump spells like Might of Old Krosa and Mutagenic Growth to increase the power of these creatures and ensure they can deal lethal damage. Protection spells like Vines of Vastwood and Blossoming Defense help to keep the infect creatures alive and allow them to sneak past blockers. The deck aims to win the game by quickly overwhelming the opponent with poison counters before they can stabilize.

This Modern Mardu Aggro deck focuses on using cheap removal spells and disruptive hand disruption to control the board early on while generating value through tokens with Young Pyromancer and Seasoned Pyromancer. The deck also includes some card advantage with Faithless Looting and Bedlam Reveler, as well as a powerful finisher in Yawgmoth, Thran Physician. The mana base consists of fetch lands and shock lands to ensure consistent color access for the spells in the deck. The deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain dominance throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through its powerful UrzaTron lands and spells, while utilizing powerful artifacts like Chalice of the Void and Karn, the Great Creator to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck aims to efficiently ramp up mana production with Expedition Map and Eldrazi Temple, and eventually overwhelm the opponent with big colorless threats like Wurmcoil Engine and Walking Ballista. The inclusion of Eternal Scourge and Myr Battlesphere provides additional value and resilience against removal spells. Overall, the deck excels at taking over the game through resource management and board control.

The deck focuses on utilizing powerful Merfolk creatures with abilities that synergize well together, such as Lord of Atlantis and Master of the Pearl Trident to boost each other's power and toughness. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive cards like Harbinger of the Tides and Merfolk Trickster to control the opponent's board. Aether Vial allows for efficient creature deployment, while Spreading Seas disrupts the opponent's mana base. Force of Negation provides protection while Dismember serves as removal. The deck aims to establish early board presence and pressure the opponent with aggressive Merfolk creatures.

This deck focuses on using Death's Shadow as a powerhouse creature and maximizing its potential by quickly reducing your own life total to make Death's Shadow as powerful as possible. The deck is supported by other efficient threats like Gurmag Angler and Snapcaster Mage, along with disruption spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize to control the game. The deck also includes cards like Thought Scour and Mishra's Bauble to enable graveyard synergies and card draw. Overall, this deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to use creatures as a toolbox to assemble a combo win condition, with cards like Devoted Druid and Vizier of Remedies. Karn, the Great Creator serves as a way to tutor for key artifacts, Finale of Devastation acts as another way to search for creatures, and Teferi, Time Raveler helps protect the combo. The deck also includes cards like Oath of Nissa and Eladamri's Call for additional consistency. Overall, the deck focuses on assembling its combo pieces efficiently to achieve victory in Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The focus of this deck is to use cards like Mishra's Bauble, Thoughtseize, and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt the opponent's hand and game plan. Utilizing cards like Tarmogoyf, Grim Flayer, and Death's Shadow to apply pressure on the opponent while also having the ability to control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push, Dismember, and Liliana of the Veil. The deck aims to be aggressive, controlling, and is capable of quickly closing out games with large threats like Death's Shadow and Tarmogoyf.
